task.title: Bagles
task.shortdesc: A warm and toasty bagel is a great platform to get creative and build a hearty breakfast. A bagel is easy to take on your commute during busy days, or to enjoy inside the apartment on slow mornings. .

taskbody.prereq:
This recipe requires a skillet, a toaster and a knife. The following ingredients will also be needed:
3 slices smoked salmon, chilled
3-4 tomoato slices cut into halves
1 tablespoon of hummus
1 green bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 teaspoon vegetable oil
1 tablespoon cream cheese
1 lemon, halved
Salt and papper to taste
1 whole wheat bagel, sliced and toasted

step.cmd: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the sliced bell pepper with salt and pepper to taste. Stir the bell peppers occaisionally and allow to cook for 5-10 minutes to cook

substep.cmd: Drain the bell peppers of any excess oil after cooking is complete
Allow bell peppers to cool before assembling with the bagel

step.cmd: Toast the sliced bagel in the toaster for two minutes or until golden brown
To assemble, spread each side of the bagel with cream cheese and top with the cooked bell peppers and smoked salmon
To assemlbe, spread each side of the bagel with hummus and top with the cooked bell peppers and sliced tomatos
